api/CG.Blazor.Forms.Attributes.html.title: Namespace CG.Blazor.Forms.Attributes
api/CG.Blazor.Forms.Attributes.html.keywords: Namespace CG.Blazor.Forms.Attributes Classes RenderSfCheckBoxAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a System.Boolean property, causes the form generator to render the property as a component. RenderSfColorPickerAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a System.String property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker component. RenderSfComboBoxAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a System.String property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfComboBox`2 component. RenderSfDatePickerAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.SfDatePicker`1 component. RenderSfNumericTextBoxAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a numeric property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfNumericTextBox`1 component. RenderSfRadioGroupAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a System.String property, causes the form generator to render the property as a collection of Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfRadioButton`1 components. RenderSfSliderAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a numeric property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSlider`1 component. RenderSfTextBoxAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a System.String property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfTextBox component. RenderSfTimePickerAttribute This class is an attribute that, when applied to a property, causes the form generator to render the property as a Syncfusion.Blazor.Calendars.SfTimePicker`1 component. SyncfusionAttribute This class is a base for all Syncfusion specific form generation attributes.
